Thread#

Here, the class Thread are shown and described.

namespace thread#

Functions

void sleep(float s)#

Stop actual thread for a specific time.

Parameters:

s – Seconds to wait

class Thread#
#include <thread.hpp>

Public Functions

inline void set_max_i(int max_temp)#

Author

Mike

Note

Die maximale Anzahl an vorhandenen Threads

void thread_writing_true()#

Set this thread to active writing.

Programm: Thread.cpp

Author

Mike Moser

Enthält verschiedene Funktionen für Threads

void thread_writing_false()#

Set this thread to not actively writing.

bool is_writing_active()#

Checks if the thread is writing.

Returns:

true = is writing

void thread_sleep(float second)#

Sleep for a while.

Parameters:

second – Sleep for so many seconds

void thread_sleep_millisecond(uint32_t millisecond)#

Sleep for a while.

Parameters:

millisecond – Sleep for so many miliseconds

bool waiting(int a = 0)#

Waits if many threads are writing if a not used, not always the same order of writing.

Parameters:

a – wait for so many miliseconds. if a = 0 => random number is created in milliseconds

Returns:

true, when no thread is writing
